@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 2006, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 2006, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -37,0 +37,13 @@ + *

Compressor Usage

+ * An {@linkplain DeflaterInputStream input stream} that is created without specifying + * a {@linkplain Deflater compressor} will use a default compressor. The default + * compressor will be closed when the input stream is {@linkplain #close closed}. + *

+ * If a compressor is specified when creating the input stream, it is the + * responsibility of the caller to {@linkplain Deflater#close close} the + * compressor after closing the input stream. + * + * @apiNote + * The {@link #close} method should be called to release resources used by this + * stream, either directly, or with the {@code try}-with-resources statement. + * @@ -74,0 +87,4 @@ + * @apiNote + * The default compressor will be closed when this input stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. + * @@ -86,0 +103,5 @@ + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this input stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. + * @@ -98,0 +120,5 @@ + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this input stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. + * @@ -126,0 +153,1 @@ + @Override @@ -150,0 +178,1 @@ + @Override @@ -172,0 +201,1 @@ + @Override @@ -227,0 +257,1 @@ + @Override @@ -262,0 +293,1 @@ + @Override @@ -276,0 +308,1 @@ + @Override @@ -285,0 +318,1 @@ + @Override @@ -294,0 +328,1 @@ + @Override

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 1996, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 1996, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -41,0 +41,13 @@ + *

Compressor Usage

+ * An {@linkplain DeflaterOutputStream output stream} that is created without specifying + * a {@linkplain Deflater compressor} will use a default compressor. The default + * compressor will be closed when the output stream is {@linkplain #close closed}. + *

+ * If a compressor is specified when creating the output stream, it is the + * responsibility of the caller to {@linkplain Deflater#close close} the + * compressor after closing the output stream. + * + * @apiNote + * The {@link #close} method should be called to release resources used by this + * stream, either directly, or with the {@code try}-with-resources statement. + * @@ -67,0 +80,5 @@ + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. + * @@ -101,1 +119,6 @@ - * the 4-argument constructor DeflaterOutputStream(out, def, size, false). + * the 4-argument constructor {@code DeflaterOutputStream(out, def, size, false)}. + * + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. @@ -116,0 +139,5 @@ + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. + * @@ -138,1 +166,6 @@ - * the 3-argument constructor DeflaterOutputStream(out, def, false). + * the 3-argument constructor {@code DeflaterOutputStream(out, def, false)}. + * + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. @@ -154,0 +187,4 @@ + * @apiNote + * The default compressor will be closed when this output stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. + * @@ -172,1 +209,5 @@ - * the 2-argument constructor DeflaterOutputStream(out, false). + * the 2-argument constructor {@code DeflaterOutputStream(out, false)}. + * + * @apiNote + * The default compressor will be closed when this output stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. @@ -187,0 +228,1 @@ + @Override @@ -201,0 +243,1 @@ + @Override @@ -242,0 +285,1 @@ + * @@ -244,0 +288,1 @@ + @Override @@ -299,0 +344,1 @@ + @Override

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 1996, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 1996, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -41,0 +41,14 @@ + * + *

Decompressor Usage

+ * An {@linkplain InflaterInputStream input stream} that is created without specifying + * a {@linkplain Inflater decompressor} will use a default decompressor. The default + * decompressor will be closed when the input stream is {@linkplain #close closed}. + *

+ * If a decompressor is specified when creating the input stream, it is the + * responsibility of the caller to {@linkplain Inflater#close close} the + * decompressor after closing the input stream. + * + * @apiNote + * The {@link #close} method should be called to release resources used by this + * stream, either directly, or with the {@code try}-with-resources statement. + * @@ -78,0 +92,6 @@ + * + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this input stream + * {@linkplain ##decompressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Inflater decompressor}. + * @@ -97,0 +117,6 @@ + * + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this input stream + * {@linkplain ##decompressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Inflater decompressor}. + * @@ -108,0 +134,5 @@ + * + * @apiNote + * The default decompressor will be closed when this input stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. + * @@ -123,0 +154,1 @@ + @Override @@ -154,0 +186,1 @@ + @Override @@ -196,0 +229,1 @@ + @Override @@ -223,0 +257,1 @@ + @Override @@ -249,0 +284,1 @@ + * @@ -251,0 +287,1 @@ + @Override @@ -290,0 +327,1 @@ + @Override

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 2006, 2021, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 2006, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -37,0 +37,13 @@ + *

Decompressor Usage

+ * An {@linkplain InflaterOutputStream output stream} that is created without specifying + * a {@linkplain Inflater decompressor} will use a default decompressor. The default + * decompressor will be closed when the output stream is {@linkplain #close closed}. + *

+ * If a decompressor is specified when creating the output stream, it is the + * responsibility of the caller to {@linkplain Inflater#close close} the + * decompressor after closing the output stream. + * + * @apiNote + * The {@link #close} method should be called to release resources used by this + * stream, either directly, or with the {@code try}-with-resources statement. + * @@ -74,0 +87,4 @@ + * @apiNote + * The default decompressor will be closed when this output stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. + * @@ -86,0 +103,5 @@ + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##decompressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Inflater decompressor}. + * @@ -98,0 +120,5 @@ + * @apiNote + * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##decompressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Inflater decompressor}. + * @@ -126,0 +153,1 @@ + @Override @@ -145,0 +173,1 @@ + @Override @@ -202,0 +231,1 @@ + @Override @@ -222,0 +252,1 @@ + @Override
